name: Pet the Damn Cat! - Ludum Dare 51
name_original: Pet the Damn Cat! - Ludum Dare 51
description:
You work a 9-5 from the comfort of your home, but your cat is very needy.

Every 10 seconds your cat will beg for pets and they get real mad if you ignore them.  But your job is also pretty needy, and they're the ones that pay you so you should try your best to balance work and home before your shift ends.

Controls:

Hold right click to control your hand to pet your cat. They will prompt you to either pet their Head, Chest/Belly, or Butt though their body language.

If you can't tell if you're petting them in the right spot, move around until they start purring.

Minigames will pop up with general instructions on what to do
